question: Who among the following was the last ruler of the princely state of Junagarh before its annexation with India?
explanation: The name of the last ruler of the princely state of Junagarh before its annexation with India was Mohammad Mahabat Khanji III. He served as the Nawab of the princely state of Junagadh from 1911 to 1948. After the integration of Junagarh with India in 1948, he went to Karachi and later died in 1959.
